item.title: Basics
item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:7, topic:224342”][quote author=qauters link=topic=294718.msg2370406#msg2370406 date=1218199005]
Not to mention is gives you an error as soon as it enumerates “META-INF/” and “META-INF/MANIFEST.MF”
[/quote]And nativeadvert right?[/quote]
Guess not, cause it will convert the name to nativeadvert.browsercontrol (it doesn’t enumerate package directories).

item.title: Basics
item.dc:creator: @cartridges cartridges
item.description:
@cartridges wrote:

I’m bored out of my mind and want to code, only I dont have the time for it currently so here’s some basic stuff to get you started…

try {
    URL url = new URL("http://world76.runescape.com/runescape.jar");
    JarURLConnection jurl = (JarURLConnection) url.openConnection();
    JarFile jar = jurl.getJarFile();
    Enumeration<JarEntry> files = jar.entries();
    while(files.hasMoreElements()) {
        JarEntry file = files.nextElement();
        InputStream i = jar.getInputStream();
        ClassGen cg = new ClassGen(new ClassParser(i, file.getName()).parse());
        // do whatever you want
    } catch(Exception e) {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }

Done sir done.

Read full topic
